casebody.data:
Julie HOFFMAN, Jeff Whisler, and Mark Henley, for Themselves and on Behalf of All Similarly Situated Topeka Police Department Retirees, Appellants,
v.
CITY OF TOPEKA, Kansas, Municipal Corporation; and Jim Colson, City Manager, City of Topeka, Kansas, Appellees. No. 118,300 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed September 14, 2018.

Affirmed.
